{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR941ND |revision=v1.0 |series=N300 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/30/2008 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR941NX |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9132 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=ST25P64V6P |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622ETP-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9132 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9103 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=yes |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=238&model=TL-WR941ND Product page] There are multiple revisions of this device. The Flash amount seems to be the principal difference between the versions. [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr941nd On the OpenWrt wiki] (serial pinout, pictures, etc)
{{TechInfoDepot|TP-Link_TL-WR941ND_1.0|}} The TL-WR941N is identical to the TL-WR941ND aside from the antenna configuration. The TL-WR941ND has RP-SMA connectors for the 3 antennas. The TL-WR941N has integral antennas.
